text:
My favourite food, I must say is Chinese food. 
Especially my mother’s home-cooked dumplings.

I actually don’t have a pet,
Because I travel too much.

Either the pet would need to get adjusted by the jetlag all the time
or it would starve to death at home.

Particularly now, I have been working out a lot recently. 
I have been training the back muscles.

I can actually play my father’s instrument
the erhu or the Chinese violin.

It’s a very difficult instrument,
so I will always stay with the piano, hopefully.
